description: hhhhhhhh I'm too lazy to add a full description for this update, but who cares anyways?

changes.title: ⚙️ Introducing: Settings!
changes.description: Check out the settings page by right clicking anywhere on the screen!

changes.title: 🌟 New Context Menu
changes.description:
Did you know that mouses had two buttons? Well I sure didn't!
Now you can right click anything to get context-specific options!

changes.title: 🖌️ Colors are cool!
changes.description: Some random guy told me "Okay but what if you add customizable color schemes?" and I was like "shi now we talkin"

changes.title: 🌚 Dark mode
changes.description: For all the night owls out there, we finally implemented a dark mode!
